Package fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.gauge

Component and port for gauges The package fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.gauge provides a gauge component used to display value read from a sensor.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PairedGaugeI
    The component interface PairedGaugeI defines the service of getting the last displayed value of a gauge, and it is meant to be used by another gauge that is paired with the one receiveing the request.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Gauge
    The class Gauge implements a component that pulls data through some sensor data required interface to display them.
    PairedGaugeConnector
    The class PairedGaugeConnector implements a connector between paired gauges to allow them to exchange their displayed values.
    PairedGaugePort
    The class PairedGaugePort implements the port that is used to connect paired gauges to allow them to exchange their displayed values.

Package fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.gauge Description

Component and port for gauges

The package fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.gauge provides a gauge component used to display value read from a sensor. Gauge components can be paried when they measure the same phenomenon using two different means. They then exchange their last received values to be able to xompute their deviation from each other.
